metadata.Description: The use of clean and efficient cookstoves and fuels to reduce indoor air pollution and improve health, environment, and livelihoods.

clean cooking.Description: Clean cooking implements energy efficiency policies that promote the use of clean and efficient cooking technologies.
Clean cooking funds renewable energy projects that aim to provide clean cooking solutions to communities.
Clean cooking focuses on the use of sustainable biomass as a clean cooking fuel source.
Clean cooking is implemented in rural areas to provide clean cooking solutions to rural communities.
Clean cooking partners with local NGOs to implement clean cooking projects and initiatives.
Clean cooking contributes to improved health and well-being by reducing indoor air pollution and associated health risks.
Clean cooking monitors the performance and usage of clean cooking technologies to ensure their effectiveness and efficiency.
Clean cooking targets energy poverty by providing clean cooking solutions to communities without access to modern energy services.
Clean cooking addresses gender equality by reducing the burden of traditional cooking methods on women and promoting their empowerment.
